ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 17th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The Superior Court’s order is VACATED. The matter is REMANDED for proceedings consistent with the decision in Taylor v. Extendicare, 637 Pa. 163, 147 A.3d 490 (2016).
